title: Fencer's gloves
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|A pair of gloves made of white silk. They have a natural affinity with the riposte, allowing their wielder to retaliate against some missed attacks with any weapon.}} [[File:Fencer's_gloves.png]] '''''the +0 pair of fencer's gloves'''''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|1022}} +0 [[gloves]]
+3 [[dexterity]]
[[Riposte]] - when [[EV|dodging]] or [[SH|blocking]] attacks, 33% chance to retaliate with a melee attack ==Desirability== Free attacks with any [[melee weapon]] on dodge or block is quite novel, especially with strong and/or [[vampiric]] weapons. A more specialized pair of [[randart]] gloves might be better overall, but these are still pretty good gloves for high-[[EV]] or -[[SH]] melee characters. ==History== *Prior to [[0.29]], riposte did not trigger on blocked attacks. *Prior to [[0.28]], the fencer's gloves would stack with the riposte of [[Long Blades]], for a total of 66% to activate per miss. *Prior to [[0.19]], the fencer's gloves gave +4 boosts to Long Blades and [[Short Blades]] skills and increased [[EV]] by 3. They were also +2 gloves. *Prior to [[0.17]], these gloves gave +2 [[slaying]] instead of the skill bonuses. *Prior to [[0.15]], these gloves gave only +3 to dexterity, and added +8 to [[accuracy]] rather than +2 slaying. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Gloves]]
